title: Machinery
shortDesc: Importing products and sales business for combine harvesters, tractors, sugar cane haulage tractors, ploughs, harrows, planters, seed drills, sprayers, levelers, slashers, fertilizer applicators, power harrows, bellers and maize heeder for combiners.

title: Export
shortDesc: Kaleb service farmers’ house plc is also engaged in the export sector. the company is an authorized intermediary trading member of ECX as a result the export has now become one of its core business Activity. So far the company Kaleb Service farmer’s house plc is exporting Sesame and coffee.

title: Kaleb Operators and Mechanics Training Institute
shortDesc: Kaleb Operators and Mechanics Training Institute located at Shashemene, 250 km from Addis Ababa. The training Institute established September 22, 1916 on 15,476m2 area with different Facilities for (Offices, class rooms, computer lab).

title: Manufacturing and assembly
shortDesc: New line of business to manufacture easy to use farm implements for small holder farmers. Located in the western part of the country Shashemene, Ethiopia. Small holder farm equipments include; Multi crop Thresher Machine (Wheat, Barley, Teff) Maize Sheller Machine (Engine and PTO shaft dozen), Abollo Multicrop Thresher Machine, Teff Mini Planter, and Wheat seed drill or Mini Planters.
